hipay.label: HiPay Fullservice
hipay.groups:
HiPay Fullservice credentials configuration text
10 1 1 1
Api username (production account) text 10 1 1 1
Api password (production account) obscure adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted 20 1 1 1
Api TokenJS Username (production account) text 22 1 1 1
Api TokenJS Password/Public Key (production account) text 23 1 1 1
Secret passphrase (production account) The same of your HiPay Fullservice production account obscure adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted 25 1 1 1
Api username (test account) text 30 1 1 1
Api password (test account) obscure adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted 40 1 1 1
Api TokenJS Username (test account) text 45 1 1 1
Api TokenJS Password/Public Key (test account) text 46 1 1 1
Secret passphrase (test account) The same of your HiPay Fullservice test account obscure adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted 50 1 1 1
Host proxy Leave blank if no proxy text 60 1 1 1
Port proxy Leave blank if no proxy text 70 1 1 1
User proxy Leave blank if no proxy text 80 1 1 1
Password proxy Leave blank if no proxy obscure adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted 90 1 1 1
Device fingerprint select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 100 1 1 1
Basket configuration text
11 1 1 1
Activate basket select Activate the basket sending to HIPAY adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 110 1 1 1
Attribute ean select If you store support ean, indicate the field name hipay/source_attributes 120 1 1 1
Load attribute select If you activate this option, a product loading is carried out to get ean (Please see documentation ) adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 130 1 1 1
<fraud_payment translate="label" Fraud Payment Review Email This email is sended to customer, if his payment is in fraud state text 20 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Email Sender select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_identity 1 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Template select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_template 2 1 1 1
Send Payment Fraud Email Copy To text 4 1 1 1 Separate by ",".
Send Payment Fraud Email Copy Method select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_method 5 1 1 1
Fraud Payment Accept Email This email is sended to customer, if his payment is validated by merchant text 30 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Accept Email Sender select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_identity 1 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Accept Template select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_template 2 1 1 1
Send Payment Accept Email Copy To text 4 1 1 1 Separate by ",".
Send Payment Accept Email Copy Method select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_method 5 1 1 1
Fraud Payment Deny Email This email is sended to customer, if his payment is denied by merchant text 40 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Deny Email Sender select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_identity 1 1 1 1
Payment Fraud Deny Template select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_template 2 1 1 1
Send Payment Deny Email Copy To text 4 1 1 1 Separate by ",".
Send Payment Deny Email Copy Method select adminhtml/system_config_source_email_method 5 1 1 1
